name: Squares Squares DEMO 1
description:
Please feel free to test out this demo for a game I am currently developing called "Squares Squared".

In this game, you are a square that must move to a flag in order to complete each level.

The levels are a series of puzzles that start off easy enough, but progressively get more and more difficult as you get further into the game.

You move using the arrow keys and the 'S' key. The arrow keys provide different functionality for each level.

I currently have 9/40 levels completed, and not everything is quite implemented yet (I still need to add a soundtrack, more sound effects, and the rest of the levels, along with some bug fixes), hence the demo only being uploaded as of right now.

Upon completion, this game is planned to be ported for steam, itch.io, and android devices.

The demo is free to try, but donations are much appreciated to help me with this project and other future developments.

Enjoy and feel free to leave suggestions in the comments!

- Ajay
